name: European Silver Task Force
goal: The European Silver Task Force is made of 17 companies supporting various silver containing active substances in the review programme of active substances under the Biocidal Products Regulation (EU) No 528/2012 - BPR.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: The European Silver Task Force follows mainly any legislative, regulatory and policy initiatives around biocides, antimicrobial solutions, hygiene and sustainability.
